Perform HIMA analysis

Source: vignettes/HIMA_Example.Rmd
HIMA_Example.Rmd

Use below code to perform high dimensional mediation analysis.

library(mydemo)
dat <- sim_data(n = 300, p = 2000)
X <- dat$X
Y <- dat$Y
M <- dat$M
COV <- dat$COV
himaconf(X, M, Y, COV, CONFmethod = "OW", MTmethod = "HIMA2")
#> Step 1: Sure Independent Screening ...  (2025-02-06 00:52:57.836059)
#> Step 2: DLasso Penalized Estimation ...   (2025-02-06 00:53:01.569031)
#> Nodewise regressions will be computed as no argument Z was provided.
#> You can store Z to avoid the majority of the computation next time around.
#> Z only depends on the design matrix x.
